title: shyAmaLAngi kOmaLAngi
sahitya:
shyAmaLAngi kOmaLAngi shivashankari jaya mAtangi Om shakti


anupallavi

  tAmasa rAjasa sAtvika guNa bandha dondam cinti Atma sutantara varam tandaruL ambA


caraNam    kATSiyAga vandu vandu kaNNaik-kavarum maNNin Adalai sAkSiyAgak-
kaNDu nalla toNDu sheidu calanamaTra sama nilai aruL himaya gauri
